solution_line_template: Going {speed_faster} mph, the trip would take {total_distance}-mile trip / {speed_faster} miles an hour = <<{total_distance}/{speed_faster}={time_faster_speed}>>{time_faster_speed} hours.
Going {speed_slower} mph, the trip would take {total_distance}-mile trip / {speed_slower} miles an hour = <<{total_distance}/{speed_slower}={time_slower_speed}>>{time_slower_speed} hours.
